techmeme.title: Private-credit firm Sixth Street commits $4B in capital for Affirm to underwrite short-term installment loans of between four and six months (Leslie Picker/CNBC)

Google rolls out NotebookLM Plus, the enterprise version of NotebookLM with added controls for access and data management, as part of Agentspace (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Google Cloud launches Agentspace to let enterprises create and deploy AI agents for marketing, HR, software development, and more (Larry Dignan/Constellation Research)
